item.title: Recover AMLogic Android boxes everytime
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs LLC)
item.description: Theres a few ways on the amlogic chips to recover boxes, but theres also many ways to recover these units. I will talk about which I have used and others. In reality it is really difficult to fully brick one of these units permanently. I will start off with the basics and work my way up to the more advanced methods.
